description: baby with long hair wrapped in black cloth fits into hide covered cradleboard decorated with beads at head and foot and on tie bands and fringe at top and bottom
dimension: 11 1/2 x 4 1/8 x 2 1/4 in. (29.2 x 10.5 x 5.7 cm)  (overall, without fringe)
medium: Animal hide, beads, animal hair, fabric
text: Apsaalooka parents provided many toys for their children. The nature of these gifts insured that when children became adults, they would be honorable members of the community.  Constructed like a full-size one and decorated with classic Apsaalooka designs, this miniature cradleboard has a small removable doll with buffalo hair. This piece and the doll may have been created to teach young children the importance of being a good parent.
title: Toy Cradleboard and Baby Doll
